Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse with many small white inclusions and grey in section, the exterior bears faint traces of four lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393954) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393954)
